LanguageData.HerbalMedicine.label: herbal medicine
LanguageData.HerbalMedicine.description: A pack of herbal concoctions typically extracted from the healroot plant. Less potent than industrial pharmaceuticals, but much better than nothing.
LanguageData.Medicine.label: medicine
LanguageData.Medicine.description: Medical staff use these supplies to heal the wounded.
LanguageData.GlitterworldMedicine.label: glitterworld medicine
LanguageData.GlitterworldMedicine.description: Advanced medical supplies from a high-tech glitterworld.
LanguageData.MortarShell.label: mortar shell
LanguageData.MortarShell.description: An explosive shell to be fired from mortars. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Component.label: component
LanguageData.Component.description: Miscellaneous gears, capacitors, circuit boards, tubes, wheels, sensors, wires, chips, processors, and other electronic and industrial parts. Necessary for assembling complex machines or electronics.
LanguageData.Neutroamine.label: neutroamine
LanguageData.Neutroamine.description: A synthetic precursor chemical. Useless on its own, many drugs require neutroamine as an ingredient.
LanguageData.Chemfuel.label: chemfuel
LanguageData.Chemfuel.description: Volatile liquid chemical compound. Used to fuel rockets and other machines.
